description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Astro Tempest is a fast pace arcade style game with modern enhancements such as high definition graphics and 3D elements. Use your ships advanced navigation and weapons systems to hunt down and blowup asteroids. Prevent them from destroying major cities such as New York and Tokyo. Collect ship upgrades to help fight the battle. Each level becomes progressively more difficult with new challenges!
